SELECT ai.id id, ai.top_status isTop, ai.log_img logImg, ai.create_time pubTime, ai.article_title title, ai.introduce summary, ai.click_rate viewsCount, ai.article_tag tagIds, ai.create_by createBy, ai.number_like numberLike, ai.comment_number commentNumber, dict.dict_label typeName FROM article_inform ai LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data dict ON dict.dict_type = 'sys_article_type' AND dict.dict_value = ai.article_type
ai.`status` = '1'
AND article_tag LIKE concat('%',#{tagId},'%')
AND aggregate_id LIKE concat('%',#{summaryId},'%')
ORDER BY ai.create_time ASC, ai.sort DESC
ORDER BY ai.create_time DESC

SELECT ai.id, ai.article_title, ai.`status`, ai.article_type, ai.article_tag, ai.top_status, ai.origin_status, ai.comment_status, ai.log_img, ai.introduce, ai.aggregate_id, ai.sort, ac.content FROM article_inform ai LEFT JOIN article_content ac ON ai.id = ac.id WHERE ai.id = #{id}

SELECT ai.id, ai.article_title, ai.comment_status, ai.update_time, ac.html_content, ai.click_rate, ai.comment_number, ai.create_by, ai.number_like FROM article_inform ai LEFT JOIN article_content ac ON ai.id = ac.id WHERE ai.id = #{id} AND ai.`status` = '1'
SELECT article_title, click_rate, number_like FROM article_inform ORDER BY click_rate DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT id, article_title, log_img FROM article_inform WHERE `status` = '1' ORDER BY click_rate DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT ai.id, ai.article_title, ai.article_tag, ai.log_img, ai.update_time, ai.click_rate, ai.comment_number, ai.create_by FROM article_inform ai WHERE ai.id = #{id} AND ai.`status` = '1'
